scripts.doctor: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('node:child_process'); const nodeVersion = process.versions.node; const platform = process.platform + ' ' + process.arch; const ua = process.env.npm_config_user_agent || ''; const match = ua.match(/pnpm\/(\d+\.\d+\.\d+)/); let pnpmVersion = match ? match[1] : ''; if (!pnpmVersion) { const pnpmCmd = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'pnpm.cmd' : 'pnpm'; const pnpm = spawnSync(pnpmCmd, ['-v'], { encoding: 'utf8' }); pnpmVersion = pnpm.status === 0 ? pnpm.stdout.trim() : 'not found'; } const parts = nodeVersion.split('.').map(Number); const maj = parts[0] || 0; const min = parts[1] || 0; const ok = (maj > 22) || (maj === 22 && min >= 12) || (maj === 20 && min >= 19); console.log('Node ' + nodeVersion); console.log('pnpm ' + pnpmVersion); console.log('Platform ' + platform); if (!ok) { console.error('Node 22.12+ or 20.19+ is required. Please upgrade Node.'); process.exitCode = 1; }"
